SEARCH
Package model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
observer.Observable
model.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer
public class Game extends Observable implements Observer
This class represents the game. It will contain the main components for the game, such as:
  • A board;
  • An ArrayList of players;
  • The deck of object cards;

    • isInBounds

      public boolean isInBounds(int chosenMaxPlayers)
      This method checks if the number of players is within the permitted bounds.
      Parameters:
      chosenMaxPlayers - is the number of players chose by the first player.
      Returns:
      true if the number is within the bounds, false otherwise.

    • addToGame

      public void addToGame(Player player) throws TooManyPlayersException
      This method will add a player to the game, if there's enough space.
      Parameters:
      player - is the player that will be added to this game.
      Throws:
      TooManyPlayersException - if the game has already enough players. The maximum number of players for this game has been set in setMaxPlayers method.

    • isNicknameTaken

      public boolean isNicknameTaken(String playerNickname)

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      true if the username has already been used, false otherwise.
